meanings.definition: To express disapproval or criticism of something.
meanings.sent1: She discommends the idea of eating too much candy.
meanings.sent2: He discommends unhealthy habits to his friends.
meanings.sent3: The teacher discommends cheating on tests.
meanings.sent4: His frown discommends any further discussion on the topic.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's stern look discommends skipping medication.

meanings.definition: To advise against or discourage something.
meanings.sent1: The sign discommends swimming in the dangerous currents.
meanings.sent2: Parents discommend staying out too late.
meanings.sent3: The wise owl discommends flying during the storm.
meanings.sent4: The warning bell discommends entering the restricted area.
meanings.sent5: The caution tape discommends crossing the construction site.
